resources.string: Invalid input.\nPrizes must be greater then zero.
Buying is cheaper after more than

Hi, my name is Alex. 

This is the first app I ever build. 
It is mainly a practical exercise for me to get into modern app development on Android. 
If you found this app usefully in any way, I would be very happy to hear about in the Play Store. 

I am also happy to hear about any bugs, improvement ideas, etc. 

Rent or Buy is build with Jetpack Compose and Material3.
